original_text: And she looked, and, behold, the king stood at his pillar at the entering in, and the princes and the trumpets by the king: and all the people of the land rejoiced, and sounded with trumpets, also the singers with instruments of musick, and such as taught to sing praise. Then Athaliah rent her clothes, and said, Treason, Treason.
korean_text: 보매 왕이 성전 문 기둥 곁에 섰고 지휘관들과 나팔수들이 왕의 곁에 모셔 서 있으며 그 땅의 모든 백성들이 즐거워하여 나팔을 불며 노래하는 자들은 주악하며 찬송을 인도하는지라 이에 아달랴가 그의 옷을 찢으며 외치되 반역이로다 반역이로다 하매

sentences.original_text: the king stood at his pillar
sentences.korean_translation: 왕이 그의 기둥 옆에 서 있었고

sentences.original_text: and the princes and the trumpets by the king:
and all the people of the land rejoiced,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 땅의 모든 백성이 기뻐하며

sentences.original_text: also the singers with instruments of musick,
and such as taught to sing praise.
